org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.db

Interface DBSerializer<T extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the key or value to serialize
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDBSerializer

    public interface DBSerializer<T extends Serializable>
    Interface for custom serialization of keys and values used in external databases.
